configOption.enhancedworkbenches.renderI: Whether you're able to see the contents of the input on top of either Project Tables or Crafting Stations.
How far, in chunks (16 blocks), you're able to see the content of the input.
Whether the input should only be rendered if you're using 'Fancy' or higher graphic settings.
Whether the input should be rendered on Project Tables
Whether the input should be rendered on Crafting Stations
